8ball.question: Question

all: Ahhh, you're one of those people
And pigs fly- oh wait, I thought we were only talking about things that are possible
Are you okay? Normal people don't ask that
As soon as you get your grades up
As soon as your headass learns how to read
Ask me again I'm not sure
Ask your parents for permission first
Bruh what the fuck- just no
Call your grandma you dumb fuck
Call the police when you realize how dumb you are
Fuck you. I'm done with your shit
How dare you ask me such a question?!
I don't have the answer you want
I'd rather keep that to myself...
I'd rather you ask yourself first
If only it was that easy...
If you give me ice cream I'll answer
If you think about it, yes
Jesus you're killing me with these questions
My friend, it isn't that easy
Not until you get into college
Of all people, why ask me? (jk keep talking to me)
Of course you're gonna ask me that
Oh wouldn't you just love to know the answer
Only a dick like you would know
That's what the goverment want's you to think... :wink:
What are you asking me for?
What the fuck is that supposed to mean?
Yea totally- no of course not you fucker
Yes! Yes! Why won't you take yes for an answer?
clean: Ahhh, you're one of those people
And pigs fly- oh wait, I thought we were only talking about things that are possible
Are you okay? Normal people don't ask that
As soon as you get your grades up
Ask me again I'm not sure
Ask your parents for permission first
Call the police when you realize how dumb you are

I don't have the answer you want
I'd rather keep that to myself...
I'd rather you ask yourself first
If only it was that easy...
If you give me ice cream I'll answer
If you think about it, yes
Jesus you're killing me with these questions
My friend, it isn't that easy
Not until you get into college

Of course you're gonna ask me that
Oh wouldn't you just love to know the answer
That's what the goverment want's you to think... :wink:
What are you asking me for?
Yes! Yes! Why won't you take yes for an answer?

What the fuck is that supposed to mean?
Yea totally- no of course not you fucker

invite.title: Invite Magic8 Your Server
description: Hey {AUTHOR}, do you like {BOT} and want your friends to have it in their server too?
Invite the bot to your server so all your friends can enjoy {BOT}'s unique features together!

premium.title: Magic8 Premium Information
description: Donations gifted to the developers of Magic8 provide motivation and access to better bot resources. With your help, Magic8's performance and features can become nearly unlimited.
Magic8 will be around for a long time, but your support guarantees new features. Donating to any developer lets them know that people still want their project to grow.

norole: No members can join the LFG role through {BOT} if the role is not set.
{INFO} To set the LFG role, type: `{PREFIX}s lfg role <role>`

{INFO} Please type `confirm` within **10** seconds to confirm, otherwise you may ignore this message.

description: Here is our personal list of **emojis** you can add to your server easily!
This list is made by our **developers** to allow you to get the most used emojis **in your server**.
You'll be able to add all emojis listed below by running one command for the ones you want to add!
Following emojis are listed by emoji name and emoji.
footer: {VERIFIED} This list will be constantly **updating** and adding **new emojis**!
You want to **suggest** an emoji? **Join**  our **[Discord]({INVITATION})** server and let us know!
{WARNING} This feature is in **beta**. Please report **bugs/errors** in our **[Discord]({INVITATION})**!

description: Hey {USER}, thanks for using our **Emoji Bank**!
{VERIFIED} You have a good emoji to share? [Join us]({INVITATION})!

upgrade.description: Please upgrade to the [{OPTIONS}]({DONATELINK}) to create more lists.
upgrade.cannotupgrade: Lists cannot be increased through packages anymore.

reachedlimit: {INFO} To delete a list, type: `{PREFIX}lm delete <list>`
help: `{PREFIX}lm add` - Add an item to a list
`{PREFIX}lm bulkadd` - Add multiple items to a list
`{PREFIX}lm remove` - Remove an item from a list
{INFO} Use these commands for more information!
viewitemsinvalidpage: {INFO} Please provide a page number between **1** and **{TOTALPAGES}**.
invalidlist: {INFO} Please provide a list when typing the command again.
viewlists: {INFO} Type the command again with a list to view the items.
listmanager.cooldown: {CROSS} **{USER}, you are on cooldown for using the randomizer.**
nolistsavailable: {INFO} To create a list, type: `{PREFIX}lm create`
randomizermenu: To get a random item from a list, type: `{PREFIX}lm r <list>`
invalidnumber: Randomizer count must be at least **2** and less than **{MAX}** (total items).
nonewlistname: {CROSS} **{USER}, please provide a name to create a new list.**
{INFO} It is not recommended to end your list with a number. It will make it hard to view the different pages (if any).
listnametoolong: {INFO} Please provide a list name no more 30 characters.
bulkaddmenu: {INFO} To add multiple items, type the command again with a list.
bulkadding: Within **3** minutes, please provide all your items you wish to *add* to your list, separated by: `|`
bulkaddinvalid: {CROSS} **Please try again and provide at least 2 items separated by:** `|`
bulkaddnoitems: {INFO} You did not provide any items, please try again.
addmenu: {INFO} To add an item, type the command again with a list.
adding: Within **60** seconds, please provide an item you wish to *add* to your list.
listmanager.itemtoolong: {CROSS} **Please provide an item no more than 80 characters long.**
addnoitems: {INFO} You did not provide an item, please try again.
removemenu: {INFO} To remove an item, type the command again with a list.
noitemstoremove: {INFO} Please add items to this list before removing them.
removing: Within **30** seconds, please provide an item (not case sensitive) to remove.
removeinvalid: Please try again and provide a valid item.
{INFO} To view items of a list, type: `{PREFIX}lm view <list>`
removenoitems: {INFO} You did not provide an item to remove, please try again.
cooldownmenu: Randomizer cooldown can be between **5** and **300** (seconds).**
{INFO} To set the randomizer cooldown, type: `{PREFIX}lm cooldown <time>`
notanumber: {INFO} Please provide a number between **5** and **300** (seconds).

listmanager.toobig: {CROSS} **{USER}, please provide a number that is no more than 300 seconds.**

menu: `{PREFIX}ap adduser` - Disable pings for a user
`{PREFIX}ap removeuser` - Re-enable pings for a user
`{PREFIX}ap logchannel` - Log when Anti-Ping user is tagged
{WARNING} This won't actually prevent pings, it will only delete the message and warn the user.
{INFO} Use these commands for more information!

upgrade.description: Please upgrade to the [{OPTIONS}]({DONATELINK}) to disable pings for more users.
upgrade.cannotupgrade: Anti-Ping users cannot be increased through packages anymore.

addusermenu: Anti-Ping users will have their @mentions deleted by anyone who doesn't have a bypass role.
{INFO} To add a user, type: `{PREFIX}ap adduser <user>`
removeusermenu: Removing an Anti-Ping user will allow anyone to @mention them.
{INFO} To remove a user, type: `{PREFIX}ap removeuser <user>`

nousers: {INFO} To add a user, type: `{PREFIX}ap adduser`
invaliduser: Please provide a valid server member or ID.
{INFO} To remove all users, type: `{PREFIX}ap removeuser all`
messageinfo: This message will reply to members who mention an Anti-Ping user.

rolepage: {INFO} To add a role, type: `{PREFIX}ap addrole <role>`

nolongerbypass: {INFO} To add the role back to the bypass, type: `{PREFIX}ap addrole`

logchannelremove: {INFO} To set a new Anti-Ping Log Channel, type: `{PREFIX}ap logchannel`
logchannelset: {INFO} To remove the Anti-Ping Log Channel, type: `{PREFIX}ap logchannel remove`

nocategory: {INFO} You cannot create Auto Channels until a category is selected. If the Auto Voice category is deleted or moved, all Auto Channels and Sub-Channels will be deleted.

upgrade.description: Please upgrade to the [{OPTIONS}]({DONATELINK}) to create more Auto Voice Channels.
upgrade.cannotupgrade: Auto Voice Channels cannot be increased through packages anymore.

notype: Types of Auto Voice Channels that are available.
created: {INFO} This channel can create up to **two** Sub-Channels.
noneleft: {WARNING} Auto Voice Channels are now disabled because there are none left.
nocooldown: {INFO} The cooldown must be between 10 seconds and 300 seconds (5 minutes).
autovoice.notanumber: {CROSS} **{USER}, please provide a real number to set the cooldown.**
autovoice.toosmall: {CROSS} **{USER}, please provide a number that is at least 10 seconds.**
autovoice.toolarge: {CROSS} **{USER}, please provide a number that is no more than 300 seconds (5 minutes).**
viewnocategory: {INFO} Set a category to enable Auto Channels by typing: `{PREFIX}autovoice category <ID>`
viewcategory: {INFO} Disable Auto Channels by typing: `{PREFIX}autovoice category clear`
alreadydisabled: {CROSS} **There is already no category set for Auto Voice Channels.**
{INFO} To enable Auto Voice Channels, set a category by typing: `{PREFIX}autovoice category <ID>`
disabled: {INFO} All Auto Channels no longer work. To enable Auto Voice Channels again, set a category!
nopermissionincategory: {CROSS} **Please give {BOT} the following permissions to use this command.**
categoryset: {INFO} Auto Voice Channels can be created at this time!
confirmreset: Please type `confirm` to reset the generated channels.
{INFO} This will attempt to delete any created channels and reset the number displayed for each generated channel.
autovoice.didnotconfirm: {CROSS} **{USER}, you did not confirm. Auto Voice Channels were not reset.**
namemenu: The generated channels can have their name customized. Use {NUMBER} when setting the name.
{INFO} To set the name, type: `{PREFIX}av name <type> <name>`
nameinvalidtype: {INFO} To set the name, type: `{PREFIX}av name <type> <name>`
nametoolong: {INFO} Please limit the name to be no more than 8 characters, {NUMBER} is not included.
nonumberwritten: {INFO} Please put `{NUMBER}` somewhere in the text.
nameupdated: {INFO} Only new channels will receive the new name update.
help: `{PREFIX}av reset` - Delete generated channels and channel number IDs
`{PREFIX}av name` - Set the name of a channel type
`{PREFIX}av category` - Set Auto Voice Channel Category
`{PREFIX}av info` - Current Auto Voice Channels Information
{INFO} Each **Auto Channel** can only create up to **three** Sub-Channels.
